item.description:
OZZIE’S POT LUCK SOCIAL MIXER

Saturday April 25th 7 – 12pm

VFW Post 3329

16 S Main Street

Millbury, MA 01527


Admission: $8.00 Proceeds from a raffle will benefit the Ashley Tuiskula Memorial Scholarship Fund, to honor Ozzie’s daughter who passed away in 2006.


There will be a Pot Luck meal with Informal Dance lessons throughout the evening. This is an opportunity to learn those dance moves for the next Maironis Park Singles Dances, which will be on:


Friday, May 8, 8 PM- midnight

Saturday, May 30, 7-11:30 PM, both with DJ Steve Vinzi


We will learn the E Coast Swing, Electric Slide, El Paso, Mambo #5, Boot Scootin Boogie, Cha Cha, etc. If you have a dance you want to learn or dance CD’s please bring them and talk to Ozzie. The VFW is a nice, clean facility, with a good dance floor.


You will meet a lot of nice singles at this event. Please call me with any questions so that I can network you with others and insure that you are not alone at the event. Ozzie, 774 262-0075.

If your last name begins with the appropriate letter, please bring that dish to share. Please do not bring drinks as there will be a cash bar.

Last name: dish to bring:

A-H Entree

I-S Salad of any type, or dessert

T-Z Veggie tray w/dip, or Cheese and crackers


Directions from Route 290 in Worcester:

Route 290 West towards Auburn, get off Exit 12

Route 146 South into Millbury

Get off Exit 8, take Left onto Elm Street

Proceed into Millbury, take Right onto S. Main Street to find the VFW
item.name: Pot Luck Social Mixer
